docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Spotify Utils
docs.text: Utility functions for interacting with the Spotify Web API using the Spotipy library. These helpers allow you to control playback, fetch currently playing information, inspect playlist data, and search tracks.

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text:
The module loads Spotify credentials from environment variables:

  • SPOTIPY_CLIENT_ID
  • SPOTIPY_CLIENT_SECRET
  • SPOTIPY_REDIRECT_URI

All functions use full permissions defined in ALL_SCOPES.

docs.title: create_sp()
docs.text:
Creates and returns an authenticated Spotipy client using OAuth.

Scopes included:

  • user-read-currently-playing
  • user-read-playback-state
  • user-modify-playback-state
  • user-library-read
  • user-top-read
  • playlist-read-private

docs.title: search_track(track_name, artist_name=None, limit=1)
docs.text:
Searches Spotify for a track by name and (optionally) artist.

Returns: A dictionary with:

  • id
  • name
  • artists
  • album
  • release_date
  • popularity
  • external_url

Or None if no match.

docs.title: pause_playback()
docs.text: Pauses the current Spotify playback.

docs.title: resume_playback()
docs.text: Resumes playback on the active device.

docs.title: next_track()
docs.text: Skips to the next track.

docs.title: previous_track()
docs.text: Goes back to the previous track.

docs.title: play_track_in_playlist(playlist_id, track_id)
docs.text: Starts playing a specific track from a playlist.

docs.title: get_current_playing()
docs.text:
Returns metadata about the currently playing track.

Fields include:

Key Description id Track ID name Track name artists Artist names album Album name release_date Album release date popularity Spotify popularity (0–100) external_url Spotify link is_playing Whether playback is active progress_ms Current position duration_ms Track duration

docs.title: print_current_playing()
docs.text: Pretty-prints the currently playing song with timecodes.

docs.title: ms_to_min_sec(ms)
docs.text: Converts milliseconds → minutes:seconds.

docs.title: get_current_playlist_id()
docs.text: Returns the playlist ID of the playlist currently being played, or None.

docs.title: get_current_playlist()
docs.text: Returns the name of the current playlist (if playing from a playlist).

docs.title: print_current_playlist_name()
docs.text: Prints the name of the current playlist.

docs.title: get_current_playlist_info()
docs.text:
Returns a dictionary containing:

  • id
  • name
  • owner
  • url
  • tracks (number of tracks)

docs.title: print_current_playlist_info()
docs.text: Prints formatted playlist metadata.

docs.title: get_playlist_tracks(playlist_id)
docs.text:
Fetches every track in a playlist (handling pagination).

Returns a list of dictionaries:

Key Description id Track ID name Track name artists Artists album Album name release_date Release date duration_ms Duration in milliseconds popularity Popularity score url Spotify track link

docs.title: print_playlist_tracks_data(playlist_id)
docs.text: Prints all tracks in the playlist with index, name, artists, and duration.

docs.title: print_current_playlist_tracks_data()
docs.text: Prints track data for whichever playlist is currently playing.
